comments.body:
We tend to use the first line in the description to explain what the option is for.
Granted "File type." was not really helpful, but a short sentence would be nice.

Rationale: In the future we want to highlight the first line from the description in the module docs.
That makes sense to me. I'll go tinker with that a bit more and put up a new revision.

@@ -1,1 +29,33 @@    description:
    - The file type that should have SELinux contexts applied.
    - "The following file type options are available:"
    - C(a) for all files,
    - C(b) for block devices,
